name: LOVE 3 Demo
description:
Please enjoy this five level demo of LOVE 3 while I continue development. 

------------

LOVE 3 is a precision platformer where you control fiveEight, a lone survivor searching for others in a mechanical, apocalyptic world. Face challenging obstacles, discover hidden secrets, and try to find hope within the hopeless as you overcome each new danger.

What you find as you explore will influence the end, so make sure you find what’s important.

The final part of the LOVE trilogy, LOVE 3 builds upon the prior installments with features like:
• Simple to pick up and precise controls with challenging obstacles to overcome.
• 25 levels, each with secrets to discover, and original bespoke music tracks by James Bennett.
• Adaptive challenge: Set your own difficulty through respawn points and performance options like limited lives and gameplay modes and togglable slow motion
• Unique respawn mechanics that let you set your own checkpoint
• Unlockable minigames earned through discoverable secrets
• Competitive Speedrun Leaderboards for every level
• Local Co-op Play
• Authentic retro visuals with inauthentic mechanical solidarity and performance
• Full Controller support and Steam Achievements
